changeSet.comment: Change the resource_uuid field to resource_id, a foreign key to relate occurrence and dwca_resource:
Update values in resource_id field to match the id field in dwca_resource table:
changeSet.sql: update occurrence o set resource_id = (select id from dwca_resource dr where dr.gbif_package_id = o.resource_id)
changeSet.comment: Alter data type from column resource_id from text to int:
